name: select cell sets
desc: Select individual geologic layers or lithologic materials for output.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Select Cell Sets
properties.desc: The Select Cell Sets control allows the user to select the cell sets from the Input Field to include in the output.

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.
